comments: Original name was: Numbers n such that gcd(2*n,C(2*n,n))=2*n.For n a prime power (see A000961) we have gcd(2*n,C(2*n,n))=2. [Arkadiusz Wesolowski, Jul 01 2012]Also, positions where A075055 differs from A000984. - _Ralf Stephan_, Dec 11 2004
formula: Appears to be A067348(n)/2. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Mar 21 2003
author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 13 2000
extensions: Name changed by Arkadiusz Wesolowski, Jul 01 2012
